news.title: Gentoo accepted for Google Summer of Code 2009

body.p:
Gentoo has been accepted for its 4th consecutive year in the Google Summer of Code! Check out our
GSoC 2009 homepage if you are interested in this year's GSoC for Gentoo.

If you'd like to apply to be a mentor, you can do so on the webapp. Please read the
mentoring guide before applying.
Interested students can browse Gentoo's project ideas and student applications will be accepted starting March 23rd.
